messages.title: GET BREXIT DONE
messages.content: Itâ€™s a question of honesty, MPs from all parties promised to implement our decision. It isn't a question of leave (how I voted) or remain, it's about doing what was promised.

messages.title: STRENGTHEN OUR NHS
messages.content: Trust me, I know the value of our NHS. I'm living with Crohn's disease and my wife works for the NHS. As your MP I will ALWAYS protect and champion our NHS.

messages.title: NEW ENERGY & ENTHUSIASM
messages.content: Born in Southampton 41 years ago and a Millbrook Councillor with a track record of getting results locally for us all. From safeguarding our environment to tackling crime, your priorities are my priorities!

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promises to implement the decision of the Brexit referendum with honesty.
Aims to always protect and champion the NHS, mentioning personal connection to it.
Focus on safeguarding the environment, tackling crime, and serving the people's priorities with new energy and enthusiasm.

mentions.tacticalSituation: After more than 22 years of the same Labour MP locally, it is time for change.
